keel.Algorithms.Discretizers.OneR

Class Opt

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Discretizers.OneR.Opt

  • public class Opt
extends java.lang.Object

    This class represents the optimum class for a given explanatory value

    JDK 1.5

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
